casebody.data:
W & T OFFSHORE, L.L.C.
v.
TEXAS BRINE CORPORATION and Texas Brine Company, L.L.C. Texas Brine Company, L.L.C.
v.
W & T Offshore, L.L.C. NO. 2018-C-0950 Supreme Court of Louisiana. October 8, 2018

John Tarlton Olivier Clerk of Court

/s/

Deputy Clerk of Court

Granted.

And, whereas, the Court has this date, pursuant to Article 5, Section 5, of the Constitution of Louisiana, made and issued the following order, to wit- "It is ordered that the writ of review issue; that the District Court and the Court of Appeal send up the record in Duplicate of the case; and that counsel for all parties be notified."

Now, therefore, the said District Court and the Court of Appeal is hereby commanded, in the name of the State of Louisiana and of this Honorable Court, to send up forthwith to this Court, in accordance with Supreme Court Rule 1, at the City of *789New Orleans, the record in duplicate of the above-entitled case.

Witness the Honorable Justices of the Supreme Court of the State of Louisiana, on this 8 day of October, in the year of our Lord, Two Thousand-Eighteen.

th
